mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT headshot as accepter_headshot,nickname as accepter_nickname,applicant,accepter,id,status FROM apply as a join guser as u on (u.username=a.accepter) WHERE applicant = #{username} ORDER BY id) UNION (SELECT headshot as applicant_headshot,nickname as applicant_nickname,applicant,accepter,id,status FROM apply as a join guser as u on (u.username=a.applicant) WHERE accepter = #{username} ORDER BY id)
